faqs.question: What does TechCorp Solutions do?
faqs.answer: TechCorp Solutions is a leading provider of business automation software, specializing in CRM platforms, marketing automation, and data analytics solutions for businesses of all sizes.

faqs.question: What products do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer three main products: 1) CRM Platform ($99-499/month) for complete customer lifecycle management, 2) Marketing Automation ($199-999/month) for multi-channel campaigns, and 3) Analytics Suite ($299-1299/month) for real-time business insights.

faqs.question: How much do your products cost?
faqs.answer: Our pricing varies by product and features: CRM Platform starts at $99/month, Marketing Automation at $199/month, and Analytics Suite at $299/month. We offer custom enterprise packages for larger organizations.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faqs.answer: All our products include 24/7 customer support, comprehensive training, onboarding assistance, and ongoing technical support. We also provide dedicated account managers for enterprise clients.

faqs.question: Can your products integrate with our existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our products offer extensive integration capabilities with popular business tools including Salesforce, HubSpot, Mailchimp, Slack, Microsoft Office 365, and hundreds of other applications through our API and webhook support.

faqs.question: How secure is your platform?
faqs.answer: Security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliance, GDPR compliance, regular security audits, and offer single sign-on (SSO) integration for enhanced security.

faqs.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for all our products with full feature access. No credit card required to start your trial. You can upgrade anytime during or after the trial period.

faqs.question: How long does implementation take?
faqs.answer: Implementation time varies by complexity: Basic setups take 1-2 weeks, standard implementations 2-4 weeks, and complex enterprise deployments 4-8 weeks. We provide dedicated implementation specialists to ensure smooth deployment.
